thread.title: Villa Marketers Gives Away Free Vacation Rental Website Worth $3500
thread.title_full: Villa Marketers Gives Away Free Vacation Rental Website Worth $3500

author: admin
title: Villa Marketers Gives Away Free Vacation Rental Website Worth $3500
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/12/2015 @ 5:16 AM   Villa Marketers 
ORLANDO, Fla., Oct. 12, 2015 /PRNewswire-iReach/ -- Villa Marketers, a vacation rental marketing company, is giving away their best vacation rental website design package, worth $3500, to a lucky winner on November 7th. 
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151010/275908 
Jay William, founder and CEO of Villa Marketers, explains why in a recent blog post . William has always been an advocate for those in the vacation rental industry, often going above and beyond what other marketing companies do. This includes giving products and training away for free, like the premium website. 
But what the winner gets is more than a custom website. William writes, "When you work with the VM team and I, you get a full marketing experience that may just be more valuable to your business profits than the cost of the website that I'm giving to you." 
The premium website package includes one-on-one design and development consultation, a website of up to 12 pages, mobile-friendly design, big rotating banner for the home page, a blogging platform, lead capture forms, free domain name assistance, and more. 
To enter to win, individuals simply need to join the new Villa Marketers Community and answer a quick question: What's the most valuable thing you've learned in the vacation rental industry? 
The Villa Marketers Community is a social gathering place where rental owners and property managers can come together not only to connect, but to learn from one another. Members are able to post blog articles, videos, and pictures; ask experts questions about the vacation home industry; create groups; and list their vacation rental - all for free. 
Join the Villa Marketers Community for free at http://villamarketers.com/member-registration/ . 
Read William's entire blog post about the website giveaway at http://villamarketers.com/free-vacation-rental-website/ . 
About Jay William: Jay William is the author of the famous book Vacation Rental Marketing, Secrets No One Will Tell You . He is a vacation rental marketing guru and a seasoned sales strategist who has partnered with some of the biggest names in the vacation rental business to help empower owners and managers. 
About Villa Marketers: Villa Marketers is a revolutionary marketing team that caters specifically to the vacation home industry. With a variety of options available to property owners and managers, they offer marketing solutions that fit every home, every budget. You can find them online at www.villamarketers.com . 
Media Contact: Jay William, Villa Marketers, 1-800-856-8641, jay@villamarketers.com 
News distributed by PR Newswire iReach: https://ireach.prnewswire.com 
SOURCE Villa Marketers
